articles.title: Amazon blocks 1,800 job applications from suspected North Korean agents - BBC
articles.description: The firm’s chief security officer said North Koreans tried to apply for remote working IT jobs using stolen or fake identities.

articles.title: Mercedes-Benz agrees to pay $149.6 million to settle multistate emissions allegations - NBC News
articles.description: Mercedes-Benz USA and parent company Daimer AG have agreed to pay $149.6 million to settle allegations that the automaker secretly installed devices in hundreds of thousands of vehicles to pass emission tests, a coalition of attorneys general announced Monday.

articles.description: China's actual 2025 GDP growth fell short of 3%. For domestic demand to lift China above 2% GDP growth in 2026, Beijing must reverse the systemic causes of household and business malaise or pile on costly demand subsidies.
